title: Dashcam footage shows suspected migrant hanging from the back of a lorry near A2
text:
A suspected migrant has been seen seen dangling from the back of a lorry on a busy A-road.

The moment was caught on the dash cam on the vehicle behind.

The man's body can be seen poking out from the heavy duty fabric of the truck.

The footage was captured by Julie Ann Betteridge Webb on Monday on the A2 near Canterbury, Kent

In a daring move, the person is then captured fiddling with the handles on the back of the lorry before retreating back inside the vehicle.

Meanwhile, other drivers can be heard beeping their horns.

Passengers in Julie's car can also be heard shouting in an attempt to grab the driver's attention.

Posting the video to Facebook, Julie said: "We had our grandson Charlie in the back who is nearly 10 and he couldn't understand why this man was trying to get out the back.

"I got his [the driver's] attention, but he just put his hand up obviously he didn't understand why everyone was banging on their horns.

"He was a foreign driver also it was a left hand side drive."

A Kent Police spokesman, said: "Kent Police were called at 5.17pm on October 7 to reports of a number of people jumping out of the back of a lorry on the roundabout at junction 7 of the M2/A2.
description: A suspected migrant has been seen seen dangling from the back of a lorry on a busy A-road.
